data.title: SpectraLink 6020 Wireless Telephone Repair
meta_keywords: Polycom SpectraLink 6020 Wireless Telephone Repair Service
data.meta_description: Repair your Polycom SpectraLink 6020 Wireless Telephone with Axis Telesolutions, 866-867-2947. We offer a complete line of repair services and sell Avaya hardware.
data.text:
SpectraLink 6020 Wireless Telephone Repair Service $95

Get the most out of your Polycom SpectraLink 6020 Wireless Telephone

Axis Telesolutions, Inc. will improve your ROI; we do this by offering repair services for the Polycom SpectraLink 6020 Wireless Telephone. Axis Telesolutions, Inc. will Repair your Polycom SpectraLink 6020 Wireless Telephone at the component level, making your telephone look and perform like brand new. Your SpectraLink 6020 Wireless Telephone comes with a one-year warranty, is completely refurbished, individually boxed, and has all the necessary parts for redeployment.

SpectraLink 6020 Wireless Telephone REPAIR SERVICE $95

CALL- 866-867-2947 - Email - SpectraLink6020REPAIR

If you are experiencing display problems, static issues or have any other problems with your Polycom SpectraLink 6020 Wireless Telephone, you need a reliable source to repair your Polycom SpectraLink 6020 Wireless Telephone. Polycom Maintenance programs are costly and Polycom will eventually no longer support your equipment. If you are looking for a less expensive alternative to your current Polycom Service program or Polycom has released an end of support notice for your Polycom system, please contact Axis. We will increase the useful life of your Polycom telecommunications equipment.

*Get the most out of your Polycom SpectraLink 6020 Wireless Telephone. Call for repair pricing or review pricing options here.

Axis Telesolutions, Inc. offers several levels of repair service, testing service and refurbishing services. The prices listed are for typical repair and refurbishing services, normal volumes and standard warranties. For more detailed pricing and a description of options for the Polycom SpectraLink 6020 Wireless Telephone, please contact an account manager at 866-867-2947 or e-mail us at SpectraLink6020RepairPricing.

Warranty

We offer a *One Year Warranty on Polycom SpectraLink 6020 Wireless Telephone Repair Service.
